org.objectrepository.instruction
[Groovy] Class WorkflowInitiateService

java.lang.Object
  org.objectrepository.instruction.WorkflowJob
      org.objectrepository.instruction.WorkflowInitiateService

class WorkflowInitiateService
extends WorkflowJob

WorkflowInitiateService Kick starts the workflow sessions for OR instructions. A new workflow is instantiated the moment a fileSet is introduced into the staging area. Decommissions instructions that have completed there work.

Authors:
Lucien van Wouw
